description: This file defines a chat interface component for a web application, utilizing React hooks, UI components, and server actions to facilitate interactive messaging between a user and a bot. It manages message state, handles user input, and renders chat messages with support for markdown formatting.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Interface defining the structure of a chat message, including id, role, and content.

methods.name: ChatInterface
methods.description: React functional component implementing the chat UI, managing message state, input, loading state, and rendering the chat messages with markdown support.
